data.title: VXReferral - Source Referrals
data.sql: SELECT REF_ReferralSourceType.Title, (SELECT Count(ReferralId) FROM REF_Referral WHERE  REF_Referral.SourceTypeId = REF_ReferralSourceType.ReferralSourceTypeId), REF_ReferralSourceType.ReferralSourceTypeId FROM REF_ReferralSourceType

data.title: VXReferral - Processing Status Referrals
data.sql: SELECT REF_ReferralProcessStatus.Title, (SELECT Count(ReferralId) FROM REF_Referral WHERE  REF_Referral.ProcessStatusId = REF_ReferralProcessStatus.StatusId AND REF_Referral.BusinessId = <BUSINESSID>), REF_ReferralProcessStatus.StatusId FROM REF_ReferralProcessStatus

data.title: VXReferral - Processing Status Referrals & Loan Amount
data.header: Referrals by Processing Status & Loan Amount
data.sql:
SELECT REF_ReferralProcessStatus.Title, 

(SELECT Count(ReferralId) FROM REF_Referral WHERE  REF_Referral.ProcessStatusId = REF_ReferralProcessStatus.StatusId AND REF_Referral.BusinessId = <BUSINESSID>), 

(SELECT Isnull(Sum(LoanAmount),0) FROM REF_Referral, REF_Loan WHERE  REF_Loan.ReferralId = REF_Referral.ReferralId AND REF_Referral.ProcessStatusId = REF_ReferralProcessStatus.StatusId AND REF_Referral.BusinessId = <BUSINESSID>), 

REF_ReferralProcessStatus.StatusId FROM REF_ReferralProcessStatus 

WHERE (SELECT Count(ReferralId) FROM REF_Referral WHERE  REF_Referral.ProcessStatusId = REF_ReferralProcessStatus.StatusId AND REF_Referral.BusinessId = <BUSINESSID>) <> 0
